sentences.zh: 曹沫者，魯人也，以勇力事魯莊公。
莊公好力。
曹沫為魯將，與齊戰，三敗北。
魯莊公懼，乃獻遂邑之地以和。
猶復以為將。

translations.literal: Cao Mo was a man of Lu, served Lu Zhuang Gong with bravery and strength. Zhuang Gong delighted in strength. Cao Mo as Lu general, battled Qi, three times defeated retreated. Lu Zhuang Gong feared, thus offered Sui yi land to make peace. Still again made him general.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公許與魯會于柯而盟。
桓公與莊公既盟於壇上，曹沫執匕首劫齊桓公，桓公左右莫敢動，而問曰：「子將何欲？」
曹沫曰：「齊彊魯弱，而大國侵魯亦甚矣。
今魯城壞即壓齊境，君其圖之。」
桓公乃許盡歸魯之侵地。
既已言，曹沫投其匕首，下壇，北面就群臣之位，顏色不變，辭令如故。
桓公怒，欲倍其約。
管仲曰：「不可。
夫貪小利以自快，棄信於諸侯，失天下之援，不如與之。」
於是桓公乃遂割魯侵地，曹沫三戰所亡地盡復予魯。

translations.literal: Qi Huan Gong permitted meet with Lu at Ke to ally. Huan Gong with Zhuang Gong having allied on altar, Cao Mo grasped dagger hostage Qi Huan Gong. Huan Gong attendants none dared move, asked: 'You will what desire?' Cao Mo said: 'Qi strong Lu weak, great state invade Lu also extreme. Now Lu city broken then presses Qi border, lord consider it.' Huan Gong thus permitted completely return Lu invaded land. Already spoken, Cao Mo threw his dagger, descended altar, north faced took ministers' position, complexion unchanged, words as before. Huan Gong angered, wished break agreement. Guan Zhong said: 'Cannot. Greed small benefit self-pleasure, abandon trust among feudal lords, lose world support, better give him.' Thus Huan Gong then cut Qi invaded land, Cao Mo three battles lost land completely restored to Lu.

sentences.zh: 其後百六十有七年而吳有專諸之事。

translations.literal: After hundred sixty seven years then Wu had Zhuan Zhu affair.

sentences.zh: 專諸者，吳堂邑人也。
伍子胥之亡楚而如吳也，知專諸之能。
伍子胥既見吳王僚，說以伐楚之利。
吳公子光曰：「彼伍員父兄皆死於楚而員言伐楚，欲自為報私讎也，非能為吳。」
吳王乃止。
伍子胥知公子光之欲殺吳王僚，乃曰：「彼光將有內志，未可說以外事。」
乃進專諸於公子光。

translations.literal: Zhuan Zhu was Wu Tang yi person. Wu Zixu fled Chu went to Wu, knew Zhuan Zhu ability. Wu Zixu having seen Wu King Liao, persuaded attacking Chu benefit. Wu prince Guang said: 'That Wu Yuan father brothers all died in Chu yet Yuan speaks attack Chu, wishes self avenge private enmity, not can for Wu.' Wu king thus stopped. Wu Zixu knew Prince Guang desired kill Wu King Liao, thus said: 'That Guang will have inner ambition, cannot persuade with outer affairs.' Thus advanced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang.

sentences.zh: 光之父曰吳王諸樊。
諸樊弟三人：次曰餘祭，次曰夷眛，次曰季子札。
諸樊知季子札賢而不立太子，以次傳三弟，欲卒致國于季子札。
諸樊既死，傳餘祭。
餘祭死，傳夷眛。
夷眛死，當傳季子札；
季子札逃不肯立，吳人乃立夷眛之子僚為王。
公子光曰：「使以兄弟次邪，季子當立；
必以子乎，則光真適嗣，當立。」
故嘗陰養謀臣以求立。

translations.literal: Guang father called Wu King Zhu Fan. Zhu Fan younger brothers three: next called Yu Ji, next called Yi Mei, next called Ji Zi Zha. Zhu Fan knew Ji Zi Zha worthy not established crown prince, by order passed three younger brothers, wished finally give state to Ji Zi Zha. Zhu Fan having died, passed Yu Ji. Yu Ji died, passed Yi Mei. Yi Mei died, should pass Ji Zi Zha; Ji Zi Zha fled would not establish, Wu people thus established Yi Mei son Liao as king. Prince Guang said: 'If by brothers order, Ji Zi should establish; Must by son, then Guang true proper heir, should establish.' Thus often secretly nurtured plot ministers to seek establishment.

sentences.zh: 光既得專諸，善客待之。
九年而楚平王死。
春，吳王僚欲因楚喪，使其二弟公子蓋餘、屬庸將兵圍楚之灊；
使延陵季子於晉，以觀諸侯之變。
楚發兵絕吳將蓋餘、屬庸路，吳兵不得還。
於是公子光謂專諸曰：「此時不可失，不求何獲！
且光真王嗣，當立，季子雖來，不吾廢也。」
專諸曰：「王僚可殺也。
母老子弱，而兩弟將兵伐楚，楚絕其後。
方今吳外困於楚，而內空無骨鯁之臣，是無如我何。」
公子光頓首曰：「光之身，子之身也。」

translations.literal: Guang having obtained Zhuan Zhu, well treated as guest. Nine years then Chu Ping Wang died. Spring, Wu King Liao wished take Chu mourning, made his two younger brothers Prince Gai Yu, Zhu Yong lead troops surround Chu Qian; Sent Yanling Ji Zi to Jin, to observe feudal lords changes. Chu sent troops cut Wu generals Gai Yu, Zhu Yong road, Wu troops could not return. Thus Prince Guang told Zhuan Zhu: 'This time cannot lose, not seek what obtain! Moreover Guang true king heir, should establish, Ji Zi though come, not abolish me.' Zhuan Zhu said: 'King Liao can kill. Mother old son weak, two younger brothers lead troops attack Chu, Chu cut their rear. Now Wu externally distressed by Chu, internally empty without backbone ministers, is cannot do anything to me.' Prince Guang bowed head: 'Guang body, your body.'

sentences.zh: 四月丙子，光伏甲士於窟室中，而具酒請王僚。
王僚使兵陳自宮至光之家，門戶階陛左右，皆王僚之親戚也。
夾立侍，皆持長鈹。
酒既酣，公子光詳為足疾，入窟室中，使專諸置匕首魚炙之腹中而進之。
既至王前，專諸擘魚，因以匕首刺王僚，王僚立死。
左右亦殺專諸，王人擾亂。
公子光出其伏甲以攻王僚之徒，盡滅之，遂自立為王，是為闔閭。
闔閭乃封專諸之子以為上卿。

translations.literal: Fourth month bing zi, Guang hid armored soldiers in cave chamber, prepared wine invited King Liao. King Liao made troops array from palace to Guang home, doorways stairs left right, all King Liao relatives. Flanking standing attendants, all held long spears. Wine already flowing, Prince Guang feigned foot illness, entered cave chamber, made Zhuan Zhu place dagger in fish roast belly advanced it. Having reached king before, Zhuan Zhu split fish, thus with dagger stabbed King Liao, King Liao immediately died. Attendants also killed Zhuan Zhu, king people chaotic. Prince Guang brought out his hidden armored troops to attack King Liao's followers, completely exterminated them, thus self-established as king, this was Helü. Helü then enfeoffed Zhuan Zhu's son as upper minister.

sentences.zh: 其後七十餘年而晉有豫讓之事。

translations.literal: After seventy plus years then Jin had Yu Rang affair.

sentences.zh: 豫讓者，晉人也，故嘗事范氏及中行氏，而無所知名。
去而事智伯，智伯甚尊寵之。
及智伯伐趙襄子，趙襄子與韓、魏合謀滅智伯，滅智伯之後而三分其地。
趙襄子最怨智伯，漆其頭以為飲器。
豫讓遁逃山中，曰：「嗟乎！
士為知己者死，女為說己者容。
今智伯知我，我必為報讎而死，以報智伯，則吾魂魄不愧矣。」
乃變名姓為刑人，入宮涂廁，中挾匕首，欲以刺襄子。
襄子如廁，心動，執問涂廁之刑人，則豫讓，內持刀兵，曰：「欲為智伯報仇！」
左右欲誅之。
襄子曰：「彼義人也，吾謹避之耳。
且智伯亡無後，而其臣欲為報仇，此天下之賢人也。」
卒醳去之。

translations.literal: Yu Rang was Jin person, formerly served Fan clan and Zhonghang clan, without known reputation. Left served Zhi Bo, Zhi Bo much honored favored him. When Zhi Bo attacked Zhao Xiangzi, Zhao Xiangzi with Han, Wei united plotted exterminate Zhi Bo, exterminated Zhi Bo after divided his land three ways. Zhao Xiangzi most resented Zhi Bo, lacquered his head to make drinking vessel. Yu Rang fled hid in mountains, said: 'Alas! Scholar dies for one who knows him, woman adorns for one who pleases her. Now Zhi Bo knows me, I must avenge enmity die, to repay Zhi Bo, then my soul not ashamed.' Thus changed name surname became criminal, entered palace smeared toilets, middle hid dagger, wished stab Xiangzi. Xiangzi went to toilet, heart moved, seized questioned toilet smearing criminal, was Yu Rang, inside held blade weapons, said: 'Wish avenge Zhi Bo!' Attendants wished execute him. Xiangzi said: 'He righteous person, I carefully avoid him. Moreover Zhi Bo died without descendants, his minister wishes avenge enmity, this world's worthy person.' Ultimately released departed him.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，豫讓又漆身為厲，吞炭為啞，使形狀不可知，行乞於市。
其妻不識也。
行見其友，其友識之，曰：「汝非豫讓邪？」
曰：「我是也。」
其友為泣曰：「以子之才，委質而臣事襄子，襄子必近幸子。
近幸子，乃為所欲，顧不易邪？
何乃殘身苦形，欲以求報襄子，不亦難乎！」
豫讓曰：「既已委質臣事人，而求殺之，是懷二心以事其君也。
且吾所為者極難耳！
然所以為此者，將以愧天下後世之為人臣懷二心以事其君者也。」

translations.literal: Dwelt moment, Yu Rang again lacquered body became leper, swallowed charcoal became mute, made appearance unrecognizable, begged in market. His wife not recognized him. Walking saw his friend, friend recognized him, said: 'You not Yu Rang?' Said: 'I am.' Friend wept for him: 'With your talent, submit serve Xiangzi, Xiangzi must approach favor you. Approach favor you, then accomplish what desired, moreover not easy? Why thus harm body bitter form, wish seek avenge Xiangzi, not difficult!' Yu Rang said: 'Already submitted served person, yet seek kill him, is harbor two hearts serve lord. Moreover what I do extremely difficult! Yet reason do this, will shame world later generations ministers harbor two hearts serve lord.'

sentences.zh: 既去，頃之，襄子當出，豫讓伏於所當過之橋下。
襄子至橋，馬驚，襄子曰：「此必是豫讓也。」
使人問之，果豫讓也。
於是襄子乃數豫讓曰：「子不嘗事范、中行氏乎？
智伯盡滅之，而子不為報讎，而反委質臣於智伯。
智伯亦已死矣，而子獨何以為之報讎之深也？」
豫讓曰：「臣事范、中行氏，范、中行氏皆眾人遇我，我故眾人報之。
至於智伯，國士遇我，我故國士報之。」
襄子喟然嘆息而泣曰：「嗟乎豫子！
子之為智伯，名既成矣，而寡人赦子，亦已足矣。
子其自為計，寡人不復釋子！」
使兵圍之。
豫讓曰：「臣聞明主不掩人之美，而忠臣有死名之義。
前君已寬赦臣，天下莫不稱君之賢。
今日之事，臣固伏誅，然願請君之衣而擊之，焉以致報讎之意，則雖死不恨。
非所敢望也，敢布腹心！」
於是襄子大義之，乃使使持衣與豫讓。
豫讓拔劍三躍而擊之，曰：「吾可以下報智伯矣！」
遂伏劍自殺。
死之日，趙國志士聞之，皆為涕泣。

translations.literal: Having left, moment, Xiangzi when exit, Yu Rang hid at bridge he must pass. Xiangzi reached bridge, horse startled, Xiangzi said: 'This must Yu Rang.' Made people question, indeed Yu Rang. Thus Xiangzi numbered Yu Rang: 'You not formerly served Fan, Zhonghang clans? Zhi Bo completely exterminated them, yet you not avenge enmity, instead submitted ministered Zhi Bo. Zhi Bo also died, yet you alone why avenge so deep?' Yu Rang said: 'Minister served Fan, Zhonghang clans, Fan, Zhonghang clans all common people treated me, I thus common people repay. As for Zhi Bo, state knight treated me, I thus state knight repay.' Xiangzi sighed deeply wept: 'Alas Yu child! You for Zhi Bo, name already completed, my pardon you also sufficient. You self-plan, I no longer release you!' Made troops surround him. Yu Rang said: 'I heard enlightened lord not conceal others' beauty, loyal minister has die for fame righteousness. Former lord already generously pardoned minister, world none not praise lord's worthiness. Today matter, minister certainly submit to execution, yet wish request lord's robe strike it, thus realize avenge intention, then though die not regret. Not dare hope, dare bare heartfelt!' Thus Xiangzi greatly considered righteous, made envoy hold robe give Yu Rang. Yu Rang drew sword three leaps struck it, said: 'I can below repay Zhi Bo!' Thus fell sword suicide. Died day, Zhao state righteous scholars heard, all wept for him.

sentences.zh: 其後四十餘年而軹有聶政之事。

translations.literal: After forty plus years then Zhi had Nie Zheng affair.

sentences.zh: 聶政者，軹深井里人也。
殺人避仇，與母、姊如齊，以屠為事。

translations.literal: Nie Zheng was Zhi Shenjing li person. Killed person avoided enmity, with mother, sister went to Qi, took butchering as occupation.

sentences.zh: 久之，濮陽嚴仲子事韓哀侯，與韓相俠累有卻。
嚴仲子恐誅，亡去，游求人可以報俠累者。
至齊，齊人或言聶政勇敢士也，避仇隱於屠者之閒。
嚴仲子至門請，數反，然後具酒自暢聶政母前。
酒酣，嚴仲子奉黃金百溢，前為聶政母壽。
聶政驚怪其厚，固謝嚴仲子。
嚴仲子固進，而聶政謝曰：「臣幸有老母，家貧，客游以為狗屠，可以旦夕得甘毳以養親。
親供養備，不敢當仲子之賜。」
嚴仲子辟人，因為聶政言曰：「臣有仇，而行游諸侯眾矣；
然至齊，竊聞足下義甚高，故進百金者，將用為大人麤糲之費，得以交足下之驩，豈敢以有求望邪！」
聶政曰：「臣所以降志辱身居市井屠者，徒幸以養老母；
老母在，政身未敢以許人也。」
嚴仲子固讓，聶政竟不肯受也。
然嚴仲子卒備賓主之禮而去。

translations.literal: Long time, Puyang Yan Zhongzi served Han Ai Hou, with Han minister Xia Lei had grudge. Yan Zhongzi feared execution, fled departed, traveled sought person can avenge Xia Lei. Reached Qi, Qi people some spoke Nie Zheng brave warrior, avoided enmity hid among butchers. Yan Zhongzi reached door requested, several times returned, then prepared wine self-toasted before Nie Zheng mother. Wine flowing, Yan Zhongzi offered yellow gold hundred yi, presented Nie Zheng mother longevity. Nie Zheng startled strange his thickness, firmly declined Yan Zhongzi. Yan Zhongzi firmly advanced, Nie Zheng declined said: 'Minister fortunately have aged mother, family poor, guest travel as dog butcher, can morning evening obtain sweet broth nourish parents. Parents nourishment complete, dare not accept Zhongzi's gift.' Yan Zhongzi dismissed people, thus spoke Nie Zheng: 'Minister have enmity, traveled feudal lords many; Yet reached Qi, secretly heard your righteousness very high, thus advanced hundred jin gold, will use as adult coarse food expense, able befriend your joy, how dare have request expectation!' Nie Zheng said: 'Minister reason lower ambition humble body dwell market butcher, merely fortunately nourish aged mother; Aged mother in, Zheng body not dare promise others.' Yan Zhongzi firmly urged, Nie Zheng ultimately would not accept. Yet Yan Zhongzi completed host guest ritual departed.

sentences.zh: 久之，聶政母死。
既已葬，除服，聶政曰：「嗟乎！
政乃市井之人，鼓刀以屠；
而嚴仲子乃諸侯之卿相也，不遠千里，枉車騎而交臣。
臣之所以待之，至淺鮮矣，未有大功可以稱者，而嚴仲子奉百金為親壽，我雖不受，然是者徒深知政也。
夫賢者以感忿睚眦之意，而親信窮僻之人，而政獨安得嘿然而已乎！
且前日要政，政徒以老母；
老母今以天年終，政將為知己者用。」
乃遂西至濮陽，見嚴仲子曰：「前日所以不許仲子者，徒以親在；
今不幸而母以天年終。
仲子所欲報仇者為誰？
請得從事焉！」
嚴仲子具告曰：「臣之仇韓相俠累，俠累又韓君之季父也，宗族盛多，居處兵衛甚設，臣欲使人刺之，（眾）終莫能就。
今足下幸而不棄，請益其車騎壯士可為足下輔翼者。」
聶政曰：「韓之與衛，相去中閒不甚遠，今殺人之相，相又國君之親，此其勢不可以多人，多人不能無生得失，生得失則語泄，語泄是韓舉國而與仲子為讎，豈不殆哉！」
遂謝車騎人徒，聶政乃辭獨行。

translations.literal: Long time, Nie Zheng mother died. Already buried, removed mourning, Nie Zheng said: 'Alas! Zheng is market person, beats knife butchers; Yan Zhongzi is feudal lords' minister, not far thousand li, bent chariot rode befriend minister. Minister treated him, extremely shallow few, not have great merit can match, yet Yan Zhongzi offered hundred jin gold as parents longevity. I though not accept, yet this merely deeply knows Zheng. Worthy person with moved resent glare intention, personally trust poor remote person, yet Zheng alone how can silently already! Moreover previous invited Zheng, Zheng merely because aged mother; Aged mother now heaven years ended, Zheng will for knower use.' Thus west reached Puyang, saw Yan Zhongzi said: 'Previous not permitted Zhongzi, merely because parents in; Now unfortunately mother heaven years ended. Zhongzi desired avenge enmity for who? Please able follow affairs!' Yan Zhongzi completely told: 'Minister's enmity Han minister Xia Lei, Xia Lei again Han lord's younger uncle, clan numerous, dwelling guard weapons very equipped, minister wished make person stab him, finally none could succeed. Now you fortunately not abandon, please increase chariot riders strong warriors can be your assistants.' Nie Zheng said: 'Han and Wei, distance between not very far, now kill person's minister, minister again state lord's relative, this situation cannot many people, many people cannot without alive captured lost, alive captured lost then words leak, words leak is Han whole state with Zhongzi as enmity, how not dangerous!' Thus declined chariot riders people followers, Nie Zheng then alone departed.

sentences.zh: 杖劍至韓，韓相俠累方坐府上，持兵戟而衛侍者甚眾。
聶政直入，上階刺殺俠累，左右大亂。
聶政大呼，所擊殺者數十人，因自皮面決眼，自屠出腸，遂以死。

translations.literal: Held sword reached Han, Han minister Xia Lei just sat office above, held weapons halberds while guard attendants very many. Nie Zheng straight entered, ascended stairs stabbed killed Xia Lei, left right greatly chaotic. Nie Zheng greatly called, those he struck killed several ten persons, thus self-flayed face gouged eyes, self-butcher disembowel intestines, thus died.

sentences.zh: 韓取聶政尸暴於市，購問莫知誰子。
於是韓（購）縣［購］之，有能言殺相俠累者予千金。
久之莫知也。

translations.literal: Han took Nie Zheng corpse exposed market, sought questioned none knew whose son. Thus Han offered reward, able speak killed minister Xia Lei give thousand jin gold. Long time none knew.

sentences.zh: 政姊榮聞人有刺殺韓相者，賊不得，國不知其名姓，暴其尸而縣之千金，乃於邑曰：「其是吾弟與？
嗟乎，嚴仲子知吾弟！」
立起，如韓，之市，而死者果政也，伏尸哭極哀，曰：「是軹深井里所謂聶政者也。」
市行者諸眾人皆曰：「此人暴虐吾國相，王縣購其名姓千金，夫人不聞與？
何敢來識之也？」
榮應之曰：「聞之。
然政所以蒙污辱自棄於市販之閒者，為老母幸無恙，妾未嫁也。
親既以天年下世，妾已嫁夫，嚴仲子乃察舉吾弟困污之中而交之，澤厚矣，可柰何！
士固為知己者死，今乃以妾尚在之故，重自刑以絕從，妾其柰何畏歿身之誅，終滅賢弟之名！」
大驚韓市人。
乃大呼天者三，卒於邑悲哀而死政之旁。

translations.literal: Zheng sister Rong heard had person stabbed killed Han minister, thief not obtained, state not know his name surname, exposed his corpse offered thousand jin gold, thus in sorrow said: 'Perhaps my younger brother? Alas, Yan Zhongzi knows my brother!' Immediately rose, went Han, market, dead person indeed Zheng, prostrated corpse wept extreme sorrow, said: 'This Zhi Shenjing li called Nie Zheng.' Market walkers various people all said: 'This person violently abused our state minister, king offered reward his name surname thousand jin gold, lady not hear? Why dare come identify him?' Rong responded said: 'Heard. Yet Zheng reason bore defilement disgrace self-abandoned in market trading between, for aged mother fortunately without illness, concubine not married. Parents already heaven years descended world, concubine already married husband, Yan Zhongzi then examined promoted my brother poverty defilement middle befriended him, favor thick, how can! Scholar certainly dies for knower, now because concubine still in reason, heavy self-punished to cut followers, concubine how fear death body punishment, finally extinguish worthy brother name!' Greatly startled Han market people. Thus greatly called heaven three times, finally in sorrow sorrow died Zheng side.

sentences.zh: 晉、楚、齊、衛聞之，皆曰：「非獨政能也，乃其姊亦烈女也。
鄉使政誠知其姊無濡忍之志，不重暴骸之難，必絕險千里以列其名，姊弟俱僇於韓市者，亦未必敢以身許嚴仲子也。
嚴仲子亦可謂知人能得士矣！」

translations.literal: Jin, Chu, Qi, Wei heard, all said: 'Not only Zheng able, his sister also fierce woman. If made Zheng truly know his sister no soft endure will, not heavy expose corpse difficulty, must cut danger thousand li to establish his name, brother sister both executed Han market, also perhaps not dare with body promise Yan Zhongzi. Yan Zhongzi also can call know person able obtain scholars!'

sentences.zh: 其後二百二十餘年秦有荊軻之事。

translations.literal: After two hundred twenty plus years Qin had Jing Ke affair.

sentences.zh: 荊軻者，衛人也。
其先乃齊人，徙於衛，衛人謂之慶卿。
而之燕，燕人謂之荊卿。

translations.literal: Jing Ke was Wei person. His ancestor was Qi person, moved to Wei, Wei people called him Qing Qing. Went to Yan, Yan people called him Jing Qing.

sentences.zh: 荊卿好讀書擊劍，以術說衛元君，衛元君不用。
其後秦伐魏，置東郡，徙衛元君之支屬於野王。

translations.literal: Jing Qing liked read books strike sword, with strategy persuaded Wei Yuan Jun, Wei Yuan Jun not used. Afterward Qin attacked Wei, established Dong commandery, moved Wei Yuan Jun branch relatives to Ye Wang.

sentences.zh: 荊軻嘗游過榆次，與蓋聶論劍，蓋聶怒而目之。
荊軻出，人或言復召荊卿。
蓋聶曰：「曩者吾與論劍有不稱者，吾目之；
試往，是宜去，不敢留。」
使使往之主人，荊卿則已駕而去榆次矣。
使者還報，蓋聶曰：「固去也，吾曩者目攝之！」

translations.literal: Jing Ke once traveled passed Yu Ci, with Gai Nie discussed sword, Gai Nie angered glared at him. Jing Ke exited, person some said again summoned Jing Qing. Gai Nie said: 'Previously I with him discussed sword had disagreement, I glared at him; Try go, this suitable leave, not dare stay.' Made envoy go his lodging, Jing Qing then already harnessed departed Yu Ci. Envoy returned reported, Gai Nie said: 'Certainly left, my previously glared frightened him!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻游於邯鄲，魯句踐與荊軻博，爭道，魯句踐怒而叱之，荊軻嘿而逃去，遂不復會。

translations.literal: Jing Ke traveled Handan, Lu Gou Jian with Jing Ke gambled, contended road, Lu Gou Jian angered scolded him, Jing Ke silent escaped departed, thus not again met.

sentences.zh: 荊軻既至燕，愛燕之狗屠及善擊筑者高漸離。
荊軻嗜酒，日與狗屠及高漸離飲於燕市，酒酣以往，高漸離擊筑，荊軻和而歌於市中，相樂也，已而相泣，旁若無人者。
荊軻雖游於酒人乎，然其為人沈深好書；
其所游諸侯，盡與其賢豪長者相結。
其之燕，燕之處士田光先生亦善待之，知其非庸人也。

translations.literal: Jing Ke having reached Yan, loved Yan's dog butcher and good beat zhu Gao Jian Li. Jing Ke addicted wine, daily with dog butcher and Gao Jian Li drank Yan market, wine flowing then went, Gao Jian Li beat zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang in market middle, mutually happy, already then mutually wept, side as no person. Jing Ke though wandered among wine people, yet his person deep profound good books; His traveled feudal lords, all befriended their worthy heroes elders. His went Yan, Yan's recluse Tian Guang mister also well treated him, knew he not common person.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，會燕太子丹質秦亡歸燕。
燕太子丹者，故嘗質於趙，而秦王政生於趙，其少時與丹驩。
及政立為秦王，而丹質於秦。
秦王之遇燕太子丹不善，故丹怨而亡歸。
歸而求為報秦王者，國小，力不能。
其後秦日出兵山東以伐齊、楚、三晉，稍蠶食諸侯，且至於燕，燕君臣皆恐禍之至。
太子丹患之，問其傅鞠武。
武對曰：「秦地遍天下，威脅韓、魏、趙氏，北有甘泉、谷口之固，南有涇、渭之沃，擅巴、漢之饒，右隴、蜀之山，左關、殽之險，民眾而士厲，兵革有餘。
意有所出，則長城之南，易水以北，未有所定也。
柰何以見陵之怨，欲批其逆鱗哉！」
丹曰：「然則何由？」
對曰：「請入圖之。」

translations.literal: Dwelt moment, met Yan crown prince Dan hostage Qin fled returned Yan. Yan crown prince Dan, formerly often hostage Zhao, Qin king Zheng born in Zhao, his young time with Dan friendly. When Zheng established as Qin king, Dan hostage in Qin. Qin king treated Yan crown prince Dan not good, thus Dan resented fled returned. Returned sought become avenge Qin king, state small, strength could not. Afterward Qin daily sent troops east to attack Qi, Chu, three Jin, gradually nibbled feudal lords, moreover reached Yan, Yan ruler ministers all feared calamity arrived. Crown prince Dan worried, asked his tutor Ju Wu. Wu responded: 'Qin land covers world, threatens Han, Wei, Zhao clans, north has Gan Quan, Gu Kou solid, south has Jing, Wei fertile, monopolizes Ba, Han rich, right Long, Shu mountains, left Guan, Xiao dangers, people many soldiers sharp, weapons armor surplus. Intent has out, then Great Wall south, Yi water north, not yet decided. How with seen humiliate resentment, wish slap his reverse scales!' Dan said: 'Then how?' Responded: 'Please let me enter and consider the maps.'

sentences.zh: 居有閒，秦將樊於期得罪於秦王，亡之燕，太子受而捨之。
鞠武諫曰：「不可。
夫以秦王之暴而積怒於燕，足為寒心，又況聞樊將軍之所在乎？
是謂『委肉當餓虎之蹊』也，禍必不振矣！
雖有管、晏，不能為之謀也。
願太子疾遣樊將軍入匈奴以滅口。
請西約三晉，南連齊、楚，北購於單于，其後乃可圖也。」
太子曰：「太傅之計，曠日彌久，心惛然，恐不能須臾。
且非獨於此也，夫樊將軍窮困於天下，歸身於丹，丹終不以迫於彊秦而棄所哀憐之交，置之匈奴，是固丹命卒之時也。
願太傅更慮之。」
鞠武曰：「夫行危欲求安，造禍而求福，計淺而怨深，連結一人之後交，不顧國家之大害，此所謂『資怨而助禍』矣。
夫以鴻毛燎於爐炭之上，必無事矣。
且以鵰鷙之秦，行怨暴之怒，豈足道哉！
燕有田光先生，其為人智深而勇沈，可與謀。」
太子曰：「願因太傅而得交於田先生，可乎？」
鞠武曰：「敬諾。」
出見田先生，道「太子願圖國事於先生也」。
田光曰：「敬奉教。」
乃造焉。

translations.literal: Dwelt some time, Qin general Fan Yuji offended Qin king, fled to Yan, crown prince received and sheltered him. Ju Wu advised: 'Cannot. With Qin king's violence and accumulated anger at Yan, enough to chill the heart, moreover if hears Fan general's location? This called 'placing meat on hungry tiger path', calamity certainly not recoverable! Though have Guan, Yan, cannot plan for it. Wish crown prince quickly send Fan general to Xiongnu to silence mouth. Please west ally three Jin, south connect Qi, Chu, north bribe Xiongnu chief, afterward then can plot.' Crown prince said: 'Grand Tutor's plan, broad days increasingly long, heart confused, fear cannot wait moment. Moreover not only this, Fan general poor distressed in world, gave body to Dan, Dan end not because pressed by strong Qin abandon pitied friendship, place in Xiongnu, this certainly Dan's doomed time. Wish Grand Tutor reconsider.' Ju Wu said: 'Go danger seek safety, create calamity seek fortune, plan shallow resentment deep, connect one person's later friendship, not consider state's great harm, this called 'provide resentment assist calamity'. With goose feather burn on furnace charcoal above, certainly no affair. Moreover with eagle owl Qin, execute resentful violent anger, how sufficient say! Yan has Tian Guang mister, his person wisdom deep courage profound, can with plan.' Crown prince said: 'Wish through Grand Tutor get befriend Tian mister, can?' Ju Wu said: 'Respectfully yes.' Exit saw Tian mister, said 'Crown prince wishes plot state affairs with mister.' Tian Guang said: 'Respectfully receive teaching.' Thus went to him.

sentences.zh: 太子逢迎，卻行為導，跪而蔽席。
田光坐定，左右無人，太子避席而請曰：「燕秦不兩立，願先生留意也。」
田光曰：「臣聞騏驥盛壯之時，一日而馳千里；
至其衰老，駑馬先之。
今太子聞光盛壯之時，不知臣精已消亡矣。
雖然，光不敢以圖國事，所善荊卿可使也。」
太子曰：「願因先生得結交於荊卿，可乎？」
田光曰：「敬諾。」
即起，趨出。
太子送至門，戒曰：「丹所報，先生所言者，國之大事也，願先生勿泄也！」
田光俛而笑曰：「諾。」
僂行見荊卿，曰：「光與子相善，燕國莫不知。
今太子聞光壯盛之時，不知吾形已不逮也，幸而教之曰『燕秦不兩立，願先生留意也』。
光竊不自外，言足下於太子也，願足下過太子於宮。」
荊軻曰：「謹奉教。」
田光曰：「吾聞之，長者為行，不使人疑之。
今太子告光曰：『所言者，國之大事也，願先生勿泄』，是太子疑光也。
夫為行而使人疑之，非節俠也。」
欲自殺以激荊卿，曰：「願足下急過太子，言光已死，明不言也。」
因遂自刎而死。

translations.literal: Crown prince welcomed, retreated walked guided, knelt spread mat. Tian Guang sat settled, left right no person, crown prince left seat requested: 'Yan Qin not two stand, wish mister attentive.' Tian Guang said: 'Minister heard thoroughbred in vigorous time, one day gallop thousand li; To its old age, nag precede it. Now crown prince hears my vigorous time, not know minister's essence already perished. Although so, Guang not dare with plot state affairs, what good Jing Qing can send.' Crown prince said: 'Wish through mister get befriend Jing Qing, can?' Tian Guang said: 'Respectfully yes.' Immediately rose, hurried out. Crown prince sent to door, warned: 'Dan what report, mister what speak, state's great affair, wish mister not leak!' Tian Guang bent laughed: 'Yes.' Bent walked saw Jing Ke, said: 'Guang with you friendly, Yan state none not know. Now crown prince hears Guang vigorous time, not know my form already not match, fortunately teach said 'Yan Qin not two stand, wish mister attentive'. Guang secretly not self-exclude, spoke you to crown prince, wish you visit crown prince at palace.' Jing Ke said: 'Respectfully receive teaching.' Tian Guang said: 'I heard, elder for conduct, not make people suspect. Now crown prince told Guang: 'What speak state's great affair, wish mister not leak', this crown prince suspects Guang. Do conduct yet make people suspect, not righteous knight.' Wished suicide to spur Jing Ke, said: 'Wish you quickly visit crown prince, speak Guang already dead, clarify not speak.' Thus then self-slit died.

sentences.zh: 荊軻遂見太子，言田光已死，致光之言。
太子再拜而跪，膝行流涕，有頃而後言曰：「丹所以誡田先生毋言者，欲以成大事之謀也。
今田先生以死明不言，豈丹之心哉！」
荊軻坐定，太子避席頓首曰：「田先生不知丹之不肖，使得至前，敢有所道，此天之所以哀燕而不棄其孤也。
今秦有貪利之心，而欲不可足也。
非盡天下之地，臣海內之王者，其意不厭。
今秦已虜韓王，盡納其地。
又舉兵南伐楚，北臨趙；
王翦將數十萬之眾距漳、鄴，而李信出太原、雲中。
趙不能支秦，必入臣，入臣則禍至燕。
燕小弱，數困於兵，今計舉國不足以當秦。
諸侯服秦，莫敢合從。
丹之私計愚，以為誠得天下之勇士使於秦，闚以重利；
秦王貪，其勢必得所願矣。
誠得劫秦王，使悉反諸侯侵地，若曹沫之與齊桓公，則大善矣；
則不可，因而刺殺之。
彼秦大將擅兵於外而內有亂，則君臣相疑，以其閒諸侯得合從，其破秦必矣。
此丹之上願，而不知所委命，唯荊卿留意焉。」
久之，荊軻曰：「此國之大事也，臣駑下，恐不足任使。」
太子前頓首，固請毋讓，然後許諾。
於是尊荊卿為上卿，舍上舍。
太子日造門下，供太牢具，異物閒進，車騎美女恣荊軻所欲，以順適其意。

translations.literal: Jing Ke thus saw crown prince, spoke Tian Guang already dead, conveyed Guang's words. Crown prince twice bowed knelt, knee walked flowing tears, had moment then spoke: 'Dan so warned Tian mister not speak, wished complete great affair plan. Now Tian mister with death clarify not speak, how Dan's heart!' Jing Ke sat settled, crown prince left seat bowed head: 'Tian mister not know Dan's unworthiness, made reach front, dared have way, this heaven so pity Yan not abandon its orphan. Now Qin has greedy profit heart, yet desire not satisfiable. Not exhaust world land, make sea inner king, his intent not sated. Now Qin already captured Han king, completely took its land. Again raised troops south attacked Chu, north faced Zhao; Wang Jian leads several ten thousand crowd resisted Zhang, Ye, while Li Xin exits Taiyuan, Yunzhong. Zhao cannot support Qin, must enter minister, enter minister then calamity reaches Yan.' Yan small weak, repeatedly distressed by troops, now plan whole state not sufficient to resist Qin. Feudal lords submit Qin, none dare vertical alliance. Dan's private plan foolish, considered truly get world's brave warriors send to Qin, spy with heavy profit; Qin king greedy, his situation must get what wish. Truly get kidnap Qin king, make completely return feudal lords invaded land, like Cao Mo with Qi Huan Gong, then very good; If cannot, moreover stab kill him. That Qin great generals monopolize troops outside while inner has chaos, then ruler ministers mutually suspect, with their interval feudal lords get vertical alliance, their break Qin certain. This Dan's upper wish, yet not know entrust life, only Jing Qing attentive.' Long time, Jing Ke said: 'This state's great affair, minister inferior, fear not sufficient undertake mission.' Crown prince front bowed head, firmly requested not decline, then permitted promised. Thus honored Jing Qing as upper minister, lodged upper lodge. Crown prince daily made door, supplied great feast prepared, rare objects frequent presented, chariot horses beauties indulged Jing Ke what desired, to comply suit his intent.

sentences.zh: 久之，荊軻未有行意。
秦將王翦破趙，虜趙王，盡收入其地，進兵北略地至燕南界。
太子丹恐懼，乃請荊軻曰：「秦兵旦暮渡易水，則雖欲長侍足下，豈可得哉！」
荊軻曰：「微太子言，臣願謁之。
今行而毋信，則秦未可親也。
夫樊將軍，秦王購之金千斤，邑萬家。
誠得樊將軍首與燕督亢之地圖，奉獻秦王，秦王必說見臣，臣乃得有以報。」
太子曰：「樊將軍窮困來歸丹，丹不忍以己之私而傷長者之意，願足下更慮之！」

translations.literal: Long time, Jing Ke not had go intent. Qin general Wang Jian broke Zhao, captured Zhao king, completely took its land, advanced troops north seized land to Yan south border. Crown prince Dan feared, then requested Jing Ke: 'Qin troops morning evening cross Yi water, then though wish long serve you, how obtainable!' Jing Ke said: 'Without crown prince speak, minister wish see him. Now go yet no trust, then Qin not approachable. That Fan general, Qin king buys his head gold thousand jin, fief ten thousand households. Truly get Fan general head with Yan Du Kang land map, present Qin king, Qin king must pleased see minister, minister then can have to repay.' Crown prince said: 'Fan general poor distressed came submit Dan, Dan not bear with self private injure elder intention, wish you reconsider!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻知太子不忍，乃遂私見樊於期曰：「秦之遇將軍可謂深矣，父母宗族皆為戮沒。
今聞購將軍首金千斤，邑萬家，將柰何？」
於期仰天太息流涕曰：「於期每念之，常痛於骨髓，顧計不知所出耳！」
荊軻曰：「今有一言可以解燕國之患，報將軍之仇者，何如？」
於期乃前曰：「為之柰何？」
荊軻曰：「願得將軍之首以獻秦王，秦王必喜而見臣，臣左手把其袖，右手揕其匈，然則將軍之仇報而燕見陵之愧除矣。
將軍豈有意乎？」
樊於期偏袒搤捥而進曰：「此臣之日夜切齒腐心也，乃今得聞教！」
遂自剄。
太子聞之，馳往，伏尸而哭，極哀。
既已不可柰何，乃遂盛樊於期首函封之。

translations.literal: Jing Ke knew crown prince not bear, thus secretly saw Fan Yuji: 'Qin treated general can call deep, parents clan all executed exterminated. Now heard buy general head gold thousand jin, fief ten thousand households, will handle what?' Yuji faced heaven great sighed flowing tears: 'Yuji every think, often pained to bone marrow, but plan not know where out!' Jing Ke said: 'Now have one word can resolve Yan state suffering, repay general enmity, how?' Yuji then front: 'Do how?' Jing Ke said: 'Wish get general head to present Qin king, Qin king must pleased see minister, minister left hand grasp his sleeve, right hand stab his chest, then general enmity repaid Yan seen humiliate shame removed. General how intend?' Fan Yuji exposed shoulder choked cried advanced: 'This minister day night gnash teeth corrode heart, now get hear teaching!' Thus self-slit. Crown prince heard, galloped went, prostrated corpse cried, extreme sorrow. Already could not handle what, then placed Fan Yuji head in box sealed.

sentences.zh: 於是太子豫求天下之利匕首，得趙人徐夫人匕首，取之百金，使工以藥焠之，以試人，血濡縷，人無不立死者。
乃裝為遣荊卿。
燕國有勇士秦舞陽，年十三，殺人，人不敢忤視。
乃令秦舞陽為副。
荊軻有所待，欲與俱；
其人居遠未來，而為治行。
頃之，未發，太子遲之，疑其改悔，乃復請曰：「日已盡矣，荊卿豈有意哉？
丹請得先遣秦舞陽。」
荊軻怒，叱太子曰：「何太子之遣？
往而不返者，豎子也！
且提一匕首入不測之彊秦，仆所以留者，待吾客與俱。
今太子遲之，請辭決矣！」
遂發。

translations.literal: Thus crown prince beforehand sought world sharp dagger, got Zhao person Xu lady dagger, bought hundred jin gold, made artisan with medicine temper, tested on person, blood wet thread, person none not immediately died. Then prepared send Jing Qing. Yan state had brave warrior Qin Wuyang, age thirteen, killed person, people dared not offend look. Thus commanded Qin Wuyang as deputy. Jing Ke had waited person, wished with go; That person dwelt far not come, yet prepared journey. Moment, not issued, crown prince delayed him, suspected his change regret, then requested: 'Day already exhausted, Jing Qing how intend? Dan please get first send Qin Wuyang.' Jing Ke angered, scolded crown prince: 'What crown prince send? Go not return, boy child! Moreover carry one dagger enter immeasurable strong Qin, servant so stay, wait my guest with go. Now crown prince delays, please leave decided!' Thus issued.

sentences.zh: 太子及賓客知其事者，皆白衣冠以送之。
至易水之上，既祖，取道，高漸離擊筑，荊軻和而歌，為變徵之聲，士皆垂淚涕泣。
又前而為歌曰：「風蕭蕭兮易水寒，壯士一去兮不復還！」
復為羽聲慨，士皆瞋目，發盡上指冠。
於是荊軻就車而去，終已不顧。

translations.literal: Crown prince and guests knew affair, all white clothes hats to send him. Reached Yi water above, already sacrificed, took road, Gao Jianli beat zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang, made change zhi sound, scholars all hung tears wept. Again front made song: 'Wind soughs Yi water cold, brave man one go not return!' Again made yu sound lofty, scholars all stared eyes, hair all up pointed caps. Thus Jing Ke approached carriage departed, end not look back.

sentences.zh: 遂至秦，持千金之資幣物，厚遺秦王寵臣中庶子蒙嘉。
嘉為先言於秦王曰：「燕王誠振怖大王之威，不敢舉兵以逆軍吏，願舉國為內臣，比諸侯之列，給貢職如郡縣，而得奉守先王之宗廟。
恐懼不敢自陳，謹斬樊於期之頭，及獻燕督亢之地圖，函封，燕王拜送于庭，使使以聞大王，唯大王命之。」
秦王聞之，大喜，乃朝服，設九賓，見燕使者咸陽宮。
荊軻奉樊於期頭函，而秦舞陽奉地圖柙，以次進。
至陛，秦舞陽色變振恐，群臣怪之。
荊軻顧笑舞陽，前謝曰：「北蕃蠻夷之鄙人，未嘗見天子，故振慴。
願大王少假借之，使得畢使於前。」
秦王謂軻曰：「取舞陽所持地圖。」
軻既取圖奏之，秦王發圖，圖窮而匕首見。
因左手把秦王之袖，而右手持匕首揕之。
未至身，秦王驚，自引而起，袖絕。
拔劍，劍長，操其室。
時惶急，劍堅，故不可立拔。
荊軻逐秦王，秦王環柱而走。
群臣皆愕，卒起不意，盡失其度。
而秦法，群臣侍殿上者不得持尺寸之兵；
諸郎中執兵皆陳殿下，非有詔召不得上。
方急時，不及召下兵，以故荊軻乃逐秦王。
而卒惶急，無以擊軻，而以手共搏之。
是時侍醫夏無且以其所奉藥囊提荊軻也。
秦王方環柱走，卒惶急，不知所為，左右乃曰：「王負劍！」
負劍，遂拔以擊荊軻，斷其左股。
荊軻廢，乃引其匕首以擿秦王，不中，中桐柱。
秦王復擊軻，軻被八創。
軻自知事不就，倚柱而笑，箕踞以罵曰：「事所以不成者，以欲生劫之，必得約契以報太子也。」
於是左右既前殺軻，秦王不怡者良久。
已而論功，賞群臣及當坐者各有差，而賜夏無且黃金二百溢，曰：「無且愛我，乃以藥囊提荊軻也。」

translations.literal: Thus reached Qin, held thousand jin gift currency objects, thick presented Qin king favored minister middle minister Zi Meng Jia. Jia for first spoke Qin king: 'Yan king truly shaken terrified great king's might, not dare raise troops to oppose army officials, wish whole state become inner minister, compare feudal lords ranks, give tribute duty like commandery county, able maintain guard former king ancestral temple. Fear not dare self-state, respectfully behead Fan Yuji head, and offer Yan Du Kang land map, box sealed, Yan king bowed sent at court, made envoy to hear great king, only great king command.' Qin king heard, greatly pleased, court robes, set nine guests, saw Yan envoy Xianyang palace. Jing Ke presented Fan Yuji head box, Qin Wuyang presented land map case, by order advanced. Reached stairs, Qin Wuyang color changed trembled feared, ministers strange it. Jing Ke looked back laughed Wuyang, front apologized: 'North barbarian uncivilized rustic person, not tasted see emperor, thus tremble frightened. Wish great king little lenient, make him complete mission at front.' Qin king told Ke: 'Take Wuyang held land map.' Ke having taken map presented, Qin king unrolled map, map exhausted dagger appeared. Thus left hand grasped Qin king sleeve, right hand held dagger stabbed him. Not reached body, Qin king startled, self pulled rose, sleeve broke. Drew sword, sword long, gripped its scabbard. Time panicked urgent, sword firm, thus not could immediately draw. Jing Ke pursued Qin king, Qin king circled pillar walked. Ministers all astonished, suddenly rose unexpected, all lost their measure. Qin law, ministers served hall above not permitted hold inch weapons; Various langzhong held weapons all arrayed hall below, not have decree summon not could ascend. When urgent time, not reached summon below troops, thus Jing Ke pursued Qin king. Yet finally panicked urgent, no with strike Ke, with hands together fought him. At time attending physician Xia Wuqian with his carried medicine bag struck Jing Ke. Qin king just circled pillar walked, finally panicked urgent, not knew what do, left right then said: 'King carry sword!' Carry sword, then drew to strike Jing Ke, severed his left thigh. Jing Ke crippled, then drew his dagger to throw Qin king, not hit, hit paulownia pillar. Qin king again struck Ke, Ke suffered eight wounds. Ke self knew affair not succeed, leaned pillar laughed, sat cross-legged cursed: 'Affair so not complete, because wished alive kidnap him, must get treaty to repay crown prince.' Thus left right having front killed Ke, Qin king not pleased long time. Already then discussed merit, rewarded ministers and should sit each different, granted Xia Wuqian yellow gold two hundred yi, said: 'Wuqian loved me, thus with medicine bag struck Jing Ke.'

sentences.zh: 於是秦王大怒，益發兵詣趙，詔王翦軍以伐燕。
十月而拔薊城。
燕王喜、太子丹等盡率其精兵東保於遼東。
秦將李信追擊燕王急，代王嘉乃遺燕王喜書曰：「秦所以尤追燕急者，以太子丹故也。
今王誠殺丹獻之秦王，秦王必解，而社稷幸得血食。」
其後李信追丹，丹匿衍水中，燕王乃使使斬太子丹，欲獻之秦。
秦復進兵攻之。
後五年，秦卒滅燕，虜燕王喜。

translations.literal: Thus Qin king greatly angered, increased sent troops to Zhao, commanded Wang Jian army to attack Yan. Tenth month then captured Ji city. Yan king Xi, crown prince Dan etc. completely led their elite troops east defended at Liaodong. Qin general Li Xin pursued Yan king urgent, Dai king Jia then sent Yan king Xi letter: 'Qin so especially pursued Yan urgent, because crown prince Dan. Now king truly kill Dan offer Qin king, Qin king must relieve, state altars fortunately get blood food.' Afterward Li Xin pursued Dan, Dan hid Yan water, Yan king then made envoy behead crown prince Dan, wished offer Qin. Qin again advanced troops attacked. After five years, Qin finally extinguished Yan, captured Yan king Xi.

sentences.zh: 其明年，秦并天下，立號為皇帝。
於是秦逐太子丹、荊軻之客，皆亡。
高漸離變名姓為人庸保，匿作於宋子。
久之，作苦，聞其家堂上客擊筑，傍偟不能去。
每出言曰：「彼有善有不善。」
從者以告其主，曰：「彼庸乃知音，竊言是非。」
家丈人召使前擊筑，一坐稱善，賜酒。
而高漸離念久隱畏約無窮時，乃退，出其裝匣中筑與其善衣，更容貌而前。
舉坐客皆驚，下與抗禮，以為上客。
使擊筑而歌，客無不流涕而去者。
宋子傳客之，聞於秦始皇。
秦始皇召見，人有識者，乃曰：「高漸離也。」
秦皇帝惜其善擊筑，重赦之，乃矐其目。
使擊筑，未嘗不稱善。
稍益近之，高漸離乃以鉛置筑中，復進得近，舉筑樸秦皇帝，不中。
於是遂誅高漸離，終身不復近諸侯之人。

translations.literal: Its next year, Qin united world, established title emperor. Thus Qin pursued crown prince Dan, Jing Ke guests, all fled. Gao Jianli changed name surname became person menial servant, hid worked at Song Zi. Long time, work bitter, heard his family hall guest beat zhu, eavesdropped could not leave. Every exit spoke: 'That has good has not good.' Followers told his master, said: 'That menial actually knows sound, secretly speaks right wrong.' Family elder summoned made front beat zhu, one seat praised good, granted wine. Gao Jianli thought long hidden feared restraint no end time, then retreated, exited his outfit box zhu with his good clothes, changed appearance front. Whole seat guests all startled, descended with equal ritual, considered upper guest. Made beat zhu sang, guests none not flowing tears departed. Song Zi transmitted guests, heard by Qin Shi Huang. Qin Shi Huang summoned saw, person had recognized, then said: 'Gao Jianli.' Qin emperor cherished his good beat zhu, heavy pardoned him, then blinded his eyes. Made beat zhu, not tasted not praised good. Gradually increased close him, Gao Jianli then with lead placed zhu middle, again advanced got close, raised zhu struck Qin emperor, not hit. Thus then executed Gao Jianli, lifetime not again approached feudal lord persons.

sentences.zh: 魯句踐已聞荊軻之刺秦王，私曰：「嗟乎，惜哉其不講於刺劍之術也！
甚矣吾不知人也！
曩者吾叱之，彼乃以我為非人也！」

translations.literal: Lu Goujian already heard Jing Ke stabbed Qin king, privately said: 'Alas, pity his not practiced sword stabbing technique! Extreme my not know person! Previously I scolded him, he then considered me not person!'

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：世言荊軻，其稱太子丹之命，「天雨粟，馬生角」也，太過。
又言荊軻傷秦王，皆非也。
始公孫季功、董生與夏無且游，具知其事，為余道之如是。
自曹沫至荊軻五人，此其義或成或不成，然其立意較然，不欺其志，名垂後世，豈妄也哉！

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: World speaks Jing Ke, its praises crown prince Dan fate, 'heaven rained grain, horse grew horns', too excessive. Again speaks Jing Ke injured Qin king, all not so. Beginning Gong Sun Ji Gong, Dong Sheng with Xia Wuqian traveled, fully knew affairs, for me told as this. From Cao Mo to Jing Ke five persons, this their righteousness or completed or not completed, yet their established intent clearly bright, not deceived their will, name hung later generations, how false!
